ng-add.description: Configures an angular cli project with default ngx-hipster configurations

jest.description: Configures an angular cli project to use Jest alongside karma

prettier.description: Configures an angular cli project to use prettier

proxy-confirm.description: Configures an angular cli project to proxy backend requests

material-layout.description: Configures an angular cli project to use angular material layout
